Award.AwardTitle: Student Travel Support for the 10th USENIX Symposium on Operating Systems Design and Implementation (OSDI 2012)

Directorate.LongName: Directorate for Computer & Information Science & Engineering

Division.LongName: Division of Computer and Network Systems

Award.AbstractNarration: This grant provides travel support for students wishing to attend the 2012 Operating Systems Design and Implementation (OSDI) conference, which is to be held in Hollywood, California, from October 8-10, 2012. The organizing committee expects that more than 500 people attend the OSDI 2012 conference, with at least 100 student attendees.
